descriptionHTML:
Clean watch face for Android Wear smartwatches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch, Motorola Moto 360, Tag Heuer, Fossil Q, LG G Watch, Asus ZenWatch etc. Clean Watch Face for business. Stylish & Elegant. This watchface is compatible with all Android Wear watches.

Clean Watch Face features:
✔ Support both round and square displays
✔ Watchface for Android Wear watches
✔ Battery level
✔ Ambient mode
✔ Day of the week
✔ Day of the month
✔ Display seconds

How to use Clean Watch Face for Android Wear smartwatches:
1. Once you install the app, the Clean watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. This may take a few minutes. You may have to wait for a while.
2. From smartwatches: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the "Android Wear" app and tap "More" button in the watchface section.
3. Enjoy your new Clean Watch Face for Android Wear!

Follow us:
Google+ : https://plus.google.com/communities/110067937523867264256

More watchfaces:
FWF Market : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=bb.fwf.market
comments: Looks great with defaults.  Hope you like them because none of the options "available" work on the free version.  Ambient mode doesn't change, no matter what you set it at.  Makes me not want to try the pay version because I'm afraid of the same issues.
I have a problem with Android Wear 2, I can't see the watchface in the smart watch. Any suggestion?
Love the simplicity but they are dishonest in that what they tell you you can do with edits, you cannot do. So I will uninstall and give poor ratings until it is fixed.
Nice looking watch face but no matter how I set the ambient mode in the app, it doesn't change on the watch. It only displays the default bient mode regardless of how the app is set.
I can't customize this at all. The changes done in phone never reflect on watch. Using pixel 2xl and Huawei 2classic
Nice looking watch face. Love the uncluttered look.can we get the option of displaying the phone battery instead of watch battery?
